entry.title: You Can't See the Walls I'm Bracing
entry.summary:
Author: cadkitten

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,361Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: It feels like one of those moments in cinema where the camera swings low to spin around the antagonist, while they stand feeling hopeless, helpless, defeated. It takes a count of ten before Dick can remind himself to breathe, to think, to fortify those walls Bruce taught him to put up around his heart in times like this. He has to. If it's the last thing he does, he refuses to let them all down when he's the last one standing.

entry.title: Do I Care if I Survive this?
entry.summary:
Author: Luluwoo

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,536Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 63

Summary: “Rumour down in Crime Alley is that you’re the dumb blonde of the Bat Clan. Got nothing but a nice face and a few cool flips to offer the crowd.” Jason reached a hand up and tapped at his temple. “Got nothing up there in that pretty, little head of yours.” Nightwing actually laughed at that, sounding unbelievably tired, and more than ready to just pass out where he sat. Which would be a very annoying thing for Jason to have to deal with this early in the morning.  It was supposed to be his one off day this month dammit. “So they say, yeah,” Nightwing agreed, voice so soft that Jason only heard it because of his enhanced hearing. There was a beat of silence, followed by a warning of incoming stupidity in the form of a teasing smile curving Nightwing’s lips. “You think my head is pretty, Jay?”   Or, Jason Todd has a rather...peculiar first encounter with Bludhaven's darling hero, Nightwing.

entry.title: My little Robin
entry.summary:
Author: VanyKruemelPendragon

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 83,092Chapters: 20/50Kudos: 169

Summary: After Robin got kidnapped, ages ago, for the ploy of a love sick Talia, for proposing to Bruce in their twisted way, she'd come to Dick, desperate, alone, pretending to be broken.Dick, just fired as Robin, with a replacement lined up, doesn't believe one word she says, until she starts being honest. Until he sees a way to handle his hurt feelings.Three years later, she's back. Not broken, not quite as desperate, and yet honest, again. Honest how she's afraid of her position as heir to the League, with an actual male heir around. Honest about her wish to get rid of said heir.Dick has no choice, not really. He has to take Damian in. It's his son, after all. Fic is fully written and will be uploaded chapter by chapter. Upload every Wednesday and Sunday. Which means this will be done... December 31st, if I do daily uploads in the Christmas weeks. It'll allow you to read the last chapter, which is set shortly after midnight, on New Year's Day, after midnight ;)

entry.title: Tired Stars
entry.summary:
Author: ResidentJazz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,618Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 333

Summary: Dick Grayson has always known how to smile on command, how to play the part people expect — even when it tears him apart. After a public breakdown and a mission that pushes him past his limits, Bruce’s disappointment feels like another verdict he can’t escape. But Jason refuses to let him spiral alone.In the quiet of a safe house, between coffee that tastes like ash, late-night movies, and the weight of a case too close to home, Dick has to confront the question he’s never dared to ask: who is he when he isn’t what Bruce made him?One step at a time, he’ll have to find out.

entry.title: I Wanna Be Your Provider
entry.summary:
Author: kitnotkat95

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,365Chapters: 4/7Kudos: 66

Summary: Dick and Slade have been together for years, Slade being Dick's daddy so he could brat it up to his hearts content, blowing off steam from the pressure of being the whole damn Justice League's golden boy. Not long after Jason returns and he's got more than enough of his own shit to work through, Dick decides he needs a daddy too, and he tells Slade he's pretty sure he's supposed to be Jason's daddy like Slade was for him. Dick thinks that what Jason needs is to learn, like he did, that it can feel good to have someone put you in your place. Slade doesn't necessarily agree with either of these trains of thought, but sometimes with Dick the only way out is through and from what Slade could see Dick was at least close enough on both counts that Jason agrees to try.

Author: soaring_bubblegum

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,861Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 89

Summary: Three weeks of escalating violence in Crime Alley had left a sour taste in his mouth. Batman and Red Hood circling each other like wolves, neither willing to back down, both convinced of their righteousness.Someone needed to break the cycle before blood painted the streets. Dick flexed his fingers, feeling the weight of the small device in his utility belt.
